message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below my minimum. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $12,500?
